pageTitle: Clover Canyon Torqued Walls Jacket | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 34in / 86.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Dry clean. 100% polyester. Fabric: Tweed. Wood grain polka dots form an undulating pattern on a timeless tweed Clover Canyon jacket. Frayed edges offer a nod to classic style. On-seam pockets lay at the hips. Covered zip placket. Unlined. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Los Angeles-born Rozae Nichols designs Clover Canyon clothing with her California roots in mind, embracing vivid colors and prints in relaxed silhouettes. This luminescent collection evokes the spirit of an endless vacation, reflecting the California urban landscape through casual elegance, cultural diversity, and richness of inspiration.
